lead_paragraph: The Kronk Gym, which helped produce the world champions Evander Holyfield and Oscar De La Hoya, has closed. The gym, in a dingy basement in Detroit and run by the trainer Emanuel Steward, had been struggling after thieves stole copper pipes in September, cutting off its water supply. Steward had been paying to keep the gym running months after Detroit closed the recreation center that housed it because of a budget shortfall.
